data.name: TORINTO
data.detailed_description:
Torinto is a Run N 'Gun game that can play up to two people simultaneously, with frantic levels and a chaotic environment, players need to beat all enemies and defeat all bosses.

  • Local CO-OP for up to 2 players!
  • A boss at the end of each stage!
  • Frantic and fun combat!
  • Detailed pixel art!



Torinto is a kingdom dominated by an oppressive wizard named "Malzer", he stole the hearts of all the inhabitants of the kingdom, but some heroes have a very strong bond with each other preventing them from being affected by the wizard's sorcery, and together they will fight to defeat this enemy and return hearts to the inhabitants of the kingdom.

data.short_description: Torinto is a Run N 'Gun game that can play up to two people simultaneously, with frantic levels and a chaotic environment, players need to beat all enemies and defeat all bosses.
data.supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese*, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: For best controller experience please use an Xbox One or Xbox 360 compatible hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: For best controller experience please use an Xbox One or Xbox 360 compatible hardware.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: wheel on any modern potato

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: wheel on any modern potato

highlighted.name: The cunning knows how to use poison to his advantage
